summary: This document discusses an alert regarding Richard D. Kahn, who was initially flagged due to a false positive related to compliance issues with a different individual of the same name. After review, it was determined that Richard D. Kahn is not the same person as the one flagged, and he is a trustee for a trust account being opened at the bank.

keyFacts: Richard D. Kahn was initially flagged in a compliance alert due to a false positive.
The alert was related to a different Richard Kahn who had compliance issues with PennMont Securities.
After review, it was confirmed that Richard D. Kahn is not the same individual as the one flagged.
Richard D. Kahn is a trustee for a trust account being opened at the bank.
The compliance team found no reputational risk associated with Richard D. Kahn.
